title: MIXEL Rainbow Magic Spring Kids, Neon Colors, Bouncy Slinky Toy, Fidget and Sensory Toy, Expandable Magic Spring, Great Gifts for Birthday, Stress Relief Toy (12 PCS)
features: SET INCLUDES: One spring includes three expandable magic springs in varying sizes- one small, one medium, and one large. This variety ensures that children have different options to play with, enhancing their tactile and sensory experiences.

VIBRANT NEON COLORS: The MIXEL Rainbow Magic Spring is designed with an array of bright, neon colors that are visually appealing to children. These colors not only attract attention but also stimulate sensory engagement, making it an ideal toy for kids who enjoy vibrant and lively playthings.

BOUNCY AND EXPANDABLE DESIGN: This toy features a unique bouncy spring design that allows it to expand and contract. Children can stretch the spring to various lengths, which adds an element of physical activity to their playtime. The elasticity of the material ensures that it can withstand repeated use without losing its shape or functionality.

FIDGET AND SENSORY BENEFITS: The MIXEL Magic Spring serves as a fidget toy, helping children manage stress and anxiety through tactile stimulation. Fidget toys have been shown to improve focus and concentration, making this spring a beneficial tool for kids who may need help staying engaged in tasks or calming down during overwhelming situations.

GREAT GIFT IDEA: This toy makes for an excellent gift option for birthdays or special occasions. Its fun design and interactive nature appeal to a wide range of ages, ensuring that it can be enjoyed by both younger children and older kids alike. Parents looking for unique gifts will find this toy stands out among traditional options.
description: Product description The MIXEL Rainbow Magic Spring is a vibrant and entertaining toy designed to bring endless fun and sensory stimulation to kids of all ages. Featuring neon rainbow colors, this bouncy slinky toy captivates with its mesmerizing movements as it stretches, expands, and bounces down stairs or between hands. Its expandable magic spring design provides hours of tactile and visual engagement, making it an excellent choice for playtime, stress relief, or even as a fidget toy. Lightweight and portable, this toy is easy to carry anywhere, ensuring kids can enjoy it at home, in school, or on the go. Made from durable, high-quality materials, the MIXEL Rainbow Magic Spring is designed to withstand repeated stretching and bouncing, guaranteeing long-lasting enjoyment. Perfect for promoting hand-eye coordination, fine motor skills, and creativity, it’s not only a fun toy but also a tool for sensory play and stress relief. Whether as a birthday gift, party favor, or just a fun surprise, this colorful and engaging spring toy is sure to delight children and adults alike. The MIXEL Rainbow Magic Spring is more than just a toy—it's a joyful, stress-relieving experience that sparks curiosity and imagination. Safety Warning Warning: Toy inside. Adult supervision recommended.
